Package businessLogic

Interface BlFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlFacadeImplementation
public interface BlFacade
Interface that specifies the business logic layer

  • Method Details

    • createEvent

      Event createEvent(String name, Date date, String country, Match match) throws EventAlreadyExistException
      It creates an event with its corresponding name and date.
      Parameters:
      name - an instance of the event name
      date - an instance of the date of the event
      country - the country where the event takes place
      match - Match that is going to be played in the event.
      Returns:
      it returns a new event
      Throws:
      EventAlreadyExistException - if the exception already exist in the database.

    • getEvents

      List<Event> getEvents()
      It retrieves all events.
      Returns:
      all events

    • getEvents

      List<Event> getEvents(Date date)
      It retrieves all events that take place on a given date
      Parameters:
      date - an instance of the event date
      Returns:
      it returns a collection of events

    • getQuestions

      List<Question> getQuestions(Event event)
      It returns all the questions that belong to the event
      Parameters:
      event - The event
      Returns:
      A list with all the questions of an event

    • removeQuestion

      void removeQuestion(int questionID)
      It removes the given question.
      Parameters:
      questionID - the question identification

    • getEventsMonth

      Vector<Date> getEventsMonth(Date date)
      It retrieves the dates in a month for which there are events from the database
      Parameters:
      date - of the month for which days with events want to be retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of dates

    • getEventsCountry

      List<Event> getEventsCountry(String country)
      It retrieves all the incoming events for the country passed by parameter.
      Returns:
      it returns all the incoming events for the given country

    • countUpcomingEvents

      long countUpcomingEvents()
      Returns the number of event whose date hasn't passed yet.
      Returns:
      the number of upcoming events

    • getUpcomingEvents

      List<Event> getUpcomingEvents(int n)
      Returns the latest n upcoming events sorted by ascending date.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of event to retrieve
      Returns:
      the incoming first n events

    • createQuestion

      Question createQuestion(Event event, String question, Double betMinimum) throws EventFinished, QuestionAlreadyExist
      It creates a question for an event with a question text and the minimum bet
      Parameters:
      event - to which question is added
      question - text of the question
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      the created question, or null, or an exception
      Throws:
      EventFinished - if current data is after data of the event
      QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

    • createForecast

      Forecast createForecast(Question question, String result, double fee) throws ForecastAlreadyExistException
      It calls a data access method in order to store a given forecast in the database
      Parameters:
      question - question for which the forecast is going to be created
      result - result of the forecast
      fee - fee of the forecast
      Throws:
      ForecastAlreadyExistException

    • removeForecast

      void removeForecast(int forecastID)
      It removes the given question.
      Parameters:
      forecastID - the forecast identification

    • register

      void register(String username, String firstName, String lastName, String address, String email, String password, String confirmPassword, int year, int month, int day, Long cardNumber, Date expirationDate, Integer securityCode) throws InvalidDateException, UnderageRegistrationException, IncorrectPSWConfirmException, PswTooShortException, NoMatchingPatternException, UsernameAlreadyInDBException, CreditCardAlreadyExists
      It registers a user into the database
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of the username
      firstName - an instance of the first name of the user
      lastName - an instance of the last name of the user
      address - current billing address of the user
      email - email of the user
      password - password of the user
      confirmPassword - additional password query to check the original password
      year - birth year of the user
      month - month of birth of the user
      day - birth day of the user
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - format for year and month is invalid
      UnderageRegistrationException - the user is under age (less than 18 years)
      IncorrectPSWConfirmException - password and checking confirmPassword do not match
      PswTooShortException - potential password is shorter than the required minimum
      NoMatchingPatternException - email does not match the required format
      UsernameAlreadyInDBException - chosen username is already in the database
      CreditCardAlreadyExists

    • getTotalNumberOfUsers

      long getTotalNumberOfUsers()
      Retrieves the number of users registered in the application
      Returns:
      the total number of users in the application

    • login

      User login(String username, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, InvalidPasswordException
      It returns the user if successfully logged
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of the username
      password - an instance of the password
      Returns:
      it returns true if the user has logged in successfully
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - the user is not registered in the database
      InvalidPasswordException - the password is not correct

    • getUserByUsername

      User getUserByUsername(String username) throws UserNotFoundException
      It returns the user with a username passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      username - an instance of the username
      Returns:
      it returns the user that matches the username passed by parameter
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException

      Returns a list with all the users of type 1 (normal user)

    • getCurrentUser

      It sets the current user of the application
      Parameters:
      currentUser - an instance of the current user

      void updateUserData(String username, String email, String firstName, String lastName, String address) throws NoMatchingPatternException, UsernameAlreadyInDBException

      Throws:
      NoMatchingPatternException
      UsernameAlreadyInDBException

      newPwd - user's new password
      Throws:
      InvalidPasswordException

    • depositMoney

      Transaction depositMoney(double amount) throws NotEnoughMoneyException
      Deposits the requested amount of money from the given card in current user's wallet.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to deposit
      Throws:
      NotEnoughMoneyException - if there is no enough money in user's wallet

    • withdrawMoney

      Transaction withdrawMoney(double amount) throws NotEnoughMoneyException
      Applies the corresponding conversion fee to the given amount and withdraws the new amount of money into user's card.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to be withdrawn (no fee applied)
      Throws:
      NotEnoughMoneyException

    • getWalletMovementsLastMonth

      Map<String,Double> getWalletMovementsLastMonth()
      Obtains the money movements in the wallet the last month
      Returns:
      a map with the money movements in the wallet grouped by days of last month. The keys are dates (days), and values are the sum of the movements of that day (+incomes -withdraws)

    • getActiveBetsUser

      List<Bet> getActiveBetsUser()
      Retrieves all the active bets placed by the current user.
      Returns:
      all the bets placed by the current user

    • countActiveBets

      long countActiveBets()
      Retrieves the total number of active bets (this is, the ones that have no correct forecast defined yet)
      Returns:
      the number of active bets

    • getActiveMoney

      double getActiveMoney()
      Retrieves the sum of the money bet in all the active bets.
      Returns:
      the sum of the money bet in all the active bets

    • getTotalNumberOfBetsUser

      int getTotalNumberOfBetsUser()
      Retrieves the number of bets placed by the user, including the ones that have already passed
      Returns:
      the total number of bets

    • banUser

      void banUser(Integer userID, String banReason)
      Bans the user with the given id, by changing its user mode to 3 (banned user).
      Parameters:
      userID - user identification
      banReason - the reason behind user's ban

    • moneyBetPerDayLastMonth

      Map<LocalDate,Double> moneyBetPerDayLastMonth()
      Returns the money bet by all users last month and have already a correct forecast Note: the date of the bet is not recorded. Instead, the date of the event is taken into account. So the criteria used to group the amounts is actually the event date

    • wonByUsersLastMonth

      Map<LocalDate,Double> wonByUsersLastMonth()
      Returns the money won by users betting last month.

    • wonByBetAndRuinLastMonth

      Map<LocalDate,Double> wonByBetAndRuinLastMonth()
      Returns the money won by BetAndRuin betting last month.

    • getNumberOfActiveBets

      int getNumberOfActiveBets()
      Retrieves the number of bets placed by the user that has no correct forecast defined yet. The number of bets active bets

    • getNumberOfWonBets

      int getNumberOfWonBets()
      Retrieves the number of won bets.
      Returns:
      the number of won bets

    • getEarnedIncome

      double getEarnedIncome()
      Retrieves the total income earned by the user by placing bets.
      Returns:
      income obtained betting

    • removeEvent

      void removeEvent(int eventID)
      It removes an event
      Parameters:
      eventID - Event identification

    • publishResult

      void publishResult(int qID, int fID)
      It publishes the results of the given question.
      Parameters:
      qID - The question identification to which belongs the result
      fID - the correct forecast identification (the result of the question)

    • showMovements

      List<Transaction> showMovements(User user)
      It returns a list that contains all the movements that the user has done
      Parameters:
      user - The registered user
      Returns:
      A list of transactions

    • placeBet

      void placeBet(Double betAmount, Forecast forecast, User gambler) throws BetAlreadyExistsException, LateBetException, LiquidityLackException, MinBetException, UserNotFoundException
      Persists a new bet for the given gambler, in the selected forecast.
      Parameters:
      betAmount - Amount of money bet by the gambler.
      forecast - The forecast linked with the bet.
      gambler - The user who places the bet.
      Throws:
      BetAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if the gambler already had placed a bet in the same forecast.
      LateBetException - Thrown if the gambler tries to place a bet an hour before on the event associated with the forecast.
      LiquidityLackException - Thrown when gambler bets not having enough liquidity access to account for it.
      MinBetException - Exception for when user inserts less fee than required.
      UserNotFoundException

    • removeBet

      void removeBet(Bet bet)
      Removes the bet with the given id
      Parameters:
      bet - the bet.

    • getCompetitions

      List<Competition> getCompetitions()
      Getter for all the competitions of all countries.
      Returns:
      All the competitions of all countries.

    • getCompetitions

      List<Competition> getCompetitions(String country)
      Returns all the competitions for the given country.
      Parameters:
      country - Country where to get the respective competitions from.
      Returns:
      The competitions held in the given country.
